channel.title: [317] LulzServer - Server from scratch development
channel.description:
Hey guys, I made myself a blank source (took a nearly blank source, removed all skills (except for the main combat skills (attack, defence, strength, range, and magic; though even those are uncomplete) base), npcs, attacking NPC's, doors, shops, dialogue, etc) and was actually doing quite well with the development for just starting/coming back to Runescape programming (though I was doing heavy Minecraft modding, which is also Java, for months before this).
My goal: To write a source and start a decent server from near scratch, but this includes me changing stuff to my liking (such as adding stuff I think would be good in skills, removing stuff I think would be bad, changing things to how I like it).
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
First task: Woodcutting Progress: 90%, just need to add other trees besides normal and fix a bug or two. Features: Good timers, will stop at tree and stop walking when hitting, checks to make sure you have the proper WC level for the hatchet (will check lowest level hatchet), full and perfect respawning including timing and randomness (will respawn even if: player who cut logged out/all players log out/multiple people were hitting the tree/etc), gives logs to everyone cutting, correct animation including facing (won't do the appearance switch to the equipped items in-between cutting animations), perfect stopping of animation (when running away, after tree is cut, etc), the better the hatchet the faster it will cut the tree (checks best hatchet for level), running away stops cutting 100%, perfect changing into broken tree (including for players who just log in, ones who were always in, yourself, etc), perfect leveling up (showing frame, sending message, the animation, actually leveling up), and more (all these include pre-made RS trees and custom).
Please ignore the debug messages and such in the following images: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UlHhb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WTe9o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BDK2d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6I2fr.png[/img]
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Supported by: [code]xmonster F A I L S lostmyphat Coder Eddie[/code]

item.title: [317] LulzServer - Server from scratch development
item.dc:creator: @SnowBoarder7 SnowBoarder7
item.description:
@SnowBoarder7 wrote:

How does this sound?
The better the axe you have the longer you can cut a tree for, therefor the more logs and more EXP you get per tree.
It works like the sharper the axe the less likely the tree is to ‘fall down’ or become so tore up and broken that it renders rest is useless.

EDIT: I went with the system above, with some modifications and exceptions.
Normal and oak trees done, will now be easy to finish the rest tomorrow. Goodnight!

Read full topic

item.title: [317] LulzServer - Server from scratch development
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“SnowBoarder7, post:16, topic:414521”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=516488.msg3750254#msg3750254 date=1315965743]
IK. I’m not dumb <.< And I’m not trying to be a horrible person either, you would know if I’m intending to be a horrible person.
[/quote]
I never said you were, and I do not think you’re a horrible person. I was simply trying to state that I am programming the majority of the base myself and that nobody in here starts from scratch. Everyone atleast starts with basics RS rendering/logging in/packet sending/etc.

@lostmyphat An awful un-blank source, I can’t suggest it to anyone, it took me a few hours to remove a BUNCH of bull/the skills/things that didn’t work/teleporters/dialogue/etc.[/quote]Mmhm. I guess Good luck. Post more pictures. I like pictures And WC isn’t exactly the most exciting thing to look at…

Read full topic

item.title: [317] LulzServer - Server from scratch development
item.dc:creator: @SnowBoarder7 SnowBoarder7
item.description:
@SnowBoarder7 wrote:

Coder Eddie:

its very rare that people now days code from scratch,good luck and good job!

I know, and I’m sick and tired of leechers and people who just add others code into their server and say they made it, or worse call it unique. All of the skills (possibly with the exception of the main combat base, but even that I still have alot to write, including even just attacking NPC’s) will be 100% my own code, besides if you don’t code it yourself, how can you fix it? How do you improve upon it? Thank you!

Read full topic

F A I L S:

Good luck on this, I always support “Older Style” Servers, I Like the idea that you almost perfected woodcutting, Good luck if you are ever going to release this when your done. Also good luck with any future development. You have my support.

Thank you! I plan to perfect all the skills in my own way and form, this will give a unique feeling; both unique and classic gameplay.

Ven0cide:

I don’t think this is made from scratch, as it has a gameframe that I’ve seen in previous clients. Why would you use that instead of just load the ones from the cache…

The server is from near scratch, read most of whats not in it in the post, the client is just a client I downloaded.

@‘I Roll Deep’ Thanks!!

I probably can’t do any programming today, but if I can I should be able to complete woodcutting and start mining, if not tomorrow.

item.title: [317] LulzServer - Server from scratch development
item.dc:creator: @SnowBoarder7 SnowBoarder7
item.description:
@SnowBoarder7 wrote:

xmonster:

This is absolutely perfect, I like servers that remind me of rs without all that custom crap. Good job, I’m supporting you

That’s exactly what I’m trying to do, but my own style of classic (2006ish) Runescape, without all those BS commands/teleporters/monsters that stand still/1GP shops/100000X EXP/packed areas which leave nothing to do in the rest of world/etc…

Thanks so much!

Read full topic
